summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 3.8°C) and outside temperature (down 3.7°C), more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 8%), and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.2 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in rainfall (up 0.2 mm) and cloud levels (up 669 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in rainfall (up 0.2 mm), cloud levels (up 1618 m), and light levels (up 3417 lux) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 669.1m lower than yesterday, 584.7m lower than the past week, 1618.0m lower than the past month.

The cloud levels yesterday fell between 1059m minimum and 3380m maximum, with an average of 1055.1m; weekly and monthly averages were marginally higher at 1639.8m and 2670m.

summary.summary: Inside; anticipate mild and comfortable temperatures. Outside; mild and pleasant. Also, very clammy and humid and winds will be practically absent. A few light raindrops may fall, clouds will occasionally block sunlight, and very bright daylight. Low pressure may bring unsettled weather.
